Position The Arathena Rocks Hotel is an oasis of peace situated on a quiet street, a few steps from Taormina.
Restaurant Breakfast Buffet, Lunch / Dinner à la Carte
Outside
Lobby
More Informations Additional Services:
• Large free private parking. • Artistic Pool with sea water pool with sun loungers and umbrellas, derived from the wonderful bay of volcanic rock available free of charge to customers. • Internet access wi-fi in public areas free of charge. • American bar open until late evening. • Free Delivery in hotel cars and scooters (reservation service is provided by external companies). • Taxi to and from the airport of Catania at special rates (by reservation only). • At the reception you can book excursions departing from the hotel in the most beautiful places of cultural interest of the island.
